description:
I am enamored with dataclasses. I love them in Python, I love them in
Kotlin. A while back I was looking for a Kotlin dataclass feature in
Python, and was disappointed to find it wasn't there. I went digging
into the CPython source code to see if it could be added and found the
craziest function I'd ever seen, \_create_fn, and it's used everywhere
in the dataclass implementation!

Join me as I shared what I found out about my dear dataclasses, and get
a better understand of decorators and metaprogramming in Python!
title: The Craziest fn Thing I've Ever Seen (and It Lives in CPython!!!)
